title: Trolling a lost game........
body:
I feel purposefully dragging out a lost game by not surrendering should be a reportable offense...this is easily one of the biggest killjoy's for me in this game...(no I don't mean 20 vs 15 games, what i mean is when your 15 minutes in, the enemy team has 22 kills vs your teams 4, and is already at the nexus towers)

Really dunno why this is being downvoted, its borderline holding people hostage, when there is no hope of a comeback because your 7 - 29 and their already taking down your nexus towers, its not winnable, at that point a comeback isn't possible because your team is clearly on a different skill level from theirs

replies.body:
No.

Just because some defeatist thinks the game is lost at 15m when down 5 kills does not mean it actually is, _especially_ in soloq.

I see a large number of "lost" games won by 30-40m, even with some trash who refused to accept a failed forfeit vote running down mid.
